creator: ddevienne@lgc.com
text:
Allow creating a specific directory name into all directories of a nested 
<dirset>, as in:

  <target name="test6"
          description="assertSuccess: @name with nested dirset">
    <mkdir dir="mkdirs/A"/>
    <mkdir dir="mkdirs/B"/>
    <mkdir name="toto">
      <dirset dir="mkdirs" includes="A, B"/>
    </mkdir>
  </target>

... where the toto directory is create in mkdirs/A and mkdirs/B.
